In summary, 12W, 2T, 2L and that was deserving of a de-rank. Fuck yourself Gabe Newl, and valve.

Good ole CSGO, This game has caused me to find my inner self... It has also caused me to find my friends.... my best friends.... i may now be unemployed but who cares.... i have my csgo skins to keep me safe at night and i love it so much.... csgo skins have made me in a multi millionaire and without them i wouldn't be in the Lamborghini i am in today! Shooting game of un-noticeable human conflict confuses me. It makes me ask myself some serious questions such as why? Why does ignorance and misinformation breed conflict between societies? In this five versus five optical illusion based entertainment, "terrorists'" compete and breed mentally with "counter-terrorists" in a 16 round based proxy war. Lore matter not, only raw entertainment and visual stimulation/humane dopamine overflow in the form of colorful illustrations on handheld life altering mechanisms. This virtual experience is controversially outdated and lacking compared to viscous predatory competitors. That being said, mental stimulation from this visual and auditory conglomeration reached an all-time high. Such, a thank you to the developers of such an experience is necessary on my species behalf, thank you.
